summary: Build a ready-to-use app named "KDS Ai Image Generator Pro" that provides a suite of AI image creation/editing tools, each with dedicated presets and detailed configuration options.

existing_features.title: Create the ready-to-use application named "KDS Ai Image Generator Pro" with a complete shell: app header, sidebar (or top nav) listing all tools, a landing/dashboard page, and a consistent layout that works on desktop and mobile.

Add a "Tools" catalog that includes these dedicated tool pages: Logo Maker, Mockup Creator, Mini World Generator, Barbershop Stylist, Outpainting, POV Hand Creator, Background Removal, AI Retouch, Product Photographer, Sketch & Pencil Art, Wedding & Prewedding Editor, ID Photo Booth, Architectural Design Visualizer, Maternity Photo Editor, Big Head Caricature Generator, Infographic Poster Creator, Photo Restoration, Fashion Model Generator, Banner Design, Baby & Kids Photo Editor, Religious Event Photo Editor, Graduation Photo Editor, Age Transformation Filter, Magic Eraser, Collage Maker, and Filter Usia (Age Filter).

For every tool page, implement dedicated presets and detailed configuration options: each tool must provide (a) a preset selector with at least 5 presets unique to that tool, (b) an "Advanced settings" section with at least 8 configurable fields relevant to the tool (sliders, selects, toggles, text inputs), and (c) a reset-to-default action per tool.

Implement a unified "Workspace" experience for all tools: input area (upload image(s) or choose blank canvas where relevant), live preview area, and an output area with download/export controls. The UI must clearly indicate required vs optional inputs per tool.

Provide functional, offline-capable processing behavior for each tool using client-side image operations (Canvas/Web APIs) so the app is usable without relying on external AI services. Where a requested tool implies AI (e.g., background removal/outpainting/hand creation), implement a best-effort non-AI approximation (filters, masks, inpainting-like blur/clone, crop/extend canvas, compositing, stylization) and clearly label results as "Local processing preview" in the UI.

Add backend persistence for user projects and tool runs: authenticated users can save (a) tool type, (b) selected preset, (c) configuration values, (d) timestamps, and (e) references/metadata for input/output assets. Include list, view details, rename, and delete actions.

Add an English-only onboarding/help layer: for each tool page include a concise "How it works" section that describes inputs, what presets do, and what the advanced settings control (no claims about external AI).

Implement a consistent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) across the whole app with a distinctive "dark studio" look (charcoal/graphite base, warm accent color like amber or coral, high-contrast panels, subtle grain texture). Apply it consistently to navigation, tool panels, forms, and preview canvas areas. Do not use a blue/purple primary theme.

Generate and include static brand assets for the app and render them in the UI: app logo and a dashboard hero/banner background stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not served/generated by the backend).

architectural_notes: Each AI tool must have its own dedicated presets and detailed configuration options.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- App logo mark, modern monogram style, high contrast on dark background (kdsai-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide dashboard hero background, dark studio texture with warm accent lighting (kdsai-hero-bg.dim_1600x600.png)
- Tool category icon set, minimal line icons, consistent stroke, warm accent (kdsai-tool-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)

generatedImages.description: App logo mark, modern monogram style, high contrast on dark background
Wide dashboard hero background, dark studio texture with warm accent lighting
Tool category icon set, minimal line icons, consistent stroke, warm accent
